text:
Honolulu, Hawaii - Full-time - http://www.referentia.com/jobs

I work at Referentia (http://www.referentia.com/), a small (around 99 people) research and development company that focuses on the Department of Defense. We are mostly a java shop, although I also do OS-level security work. we've been working with a number of open source technologies such as Cassandra, Google GWT, a little Android, and Linux.

We have a nice range of benefits (including an Ocean view!) and a nice snack and rec room. The hours are nice and flexible and the general workplace culture is great and I love working with all of my co-workers. Very nice work attier also, I usually wear t-shirt, shorts and "flip-flops". We're currently focusing on hiring talented Software and Systems Engineers.
